user_question: What are the top three most popular streaming platforms in 2023, and what unique features do they offer?
final_answer: The top three most popular streaming platforms in 2023 are Netflix, Disney+, and Amazon Prime Video. Netflix offers a vast library of original content and personalized recommendations. Disney+ features exclusive access to Disney, Marvel, Star Wars, and Pixar content. Amazon Prime Video provides a combination of streaming and shopping benefits, including access to Amazon Originals and free shipping on Amazon purchases.
